advancements.story.enter_the_nether.desc: Build a Nether Portal out of obsidian, light it with fire and enter the Nether
advancements.nether.create_full_beacon.d: Bring a Beacon to full power by placing it on top of a mineral block pyramid
advancements.husbandry.breed_an_animal.d: Get two animals' attention with foodstuff and feed them so they breed together
advancements.nether.charge_respawn_ancho: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum using Glowstone
tutorial.craft_planks.description: You can find the recipe book in your inventory
advancements.story.obtain_armor.title: Stronger, Harder, Better
advancements.story.obtain_armor.descript: Get your hands on some iron armor. Quite the improvement.
advancements.story.smelt_iron.title: Acquire Hardware
